name: Drift Force
description:
The goal of the game is to set the fastest time for each map, currently the scores to beat are:

Track1: 49.79

Track2: 2:28.75

This game was made during the Brackeys Game Jam 2022.1 

I kind of ran out of time, so the camera and the graphics are a bit rushed, but all in all i think it turned out fairly well considering the time I was able to put into it. This is the first jam I've actually participated in, and I'm honestly surprised by how productive one can become when a deadline is set. Will definitely participate again in the future. 

Please do leave any feedback or possible bugs that you find, I might continue to work on this in the future, as I see a lot of potential in this game.

Controls (controller is recommended, no menu support though)

PC:

WASD (movement), Space (drift), ESC (menu), E (interact)

Controller:

R2(accelerate), Circle/B(Reverse), L2(Drift), Triangle/Y(interact), Start(menu)

Credits:

  • Music by: Martin Lubeck a.k.a. Foxtrox
  • Countdown audio by unnecro (freesound.org)
